name: Adept: Threatening
description:
Zoom around a space arena blasting your foes until you are big and/or confident enough to go for the Massive Anti-Matter Assault Ship (AKA MAMA Ship)

Despite University deadlines cutting the development short, this game is still a nice playable prototype that I thoroughly enjoyed making. Initially envisioned as a sandbox game, I started with the creation of a combat demonstration as a proof of concept. Testers enjoyed it but were left feeling like there could be much more added in the future.

WASD for movement

Mouse for shooting and aiming

Left Ctrl + X = Money Cheat
